statements: SELECT * FROM MoneyLaunderingDetection;
SELECT user_id, amount FROM MoneyLaunderingDetection WHERE flagged = TRUE;
SELECT user_id, transaction_date FROM MoneyLaunderingDetection ORDER BY user_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM MoneyLaunderingDetection WHERE amount > 1000;
SELECT transaction_id, user_id, amount FROM MoneyLaunderingDetection WHERE flagged = FALSE ORDER BY transaction_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM MoneyLaunderingDetection WHERE user_id = 123 AND amount > 1000 ORDER BY transaction_date DESC;
SELECT transaction_id, amount, flagged FROM MoneyLaunderingDetection WHERE flagged = TRUE ORDER BY transaction_id ASC;
SELECT user_id, SUM(amount) AS total_amount FROM MoneyLaunderingDetection GROUP BY user_id HAVING total_amount > 5000;
SELECT * FROM MoneyLaunderingDetection WHERE transaction_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31' ORDER BY amount DESC;
SELECT user_id, AVG(amount) AS avg_amount FROM MoneyLaunderingDetection GROUP BY user_id HAVING avg_amount < 500;
SELECT * FROM transactions LIMIT 10
SELECT transaction_id, amount FROM transactions WHERE merchant_id = 100
SELECT transaction_id, amount FROM transactions WHERE account_id = 200 ORDER BY transaction_date DESC
SELECT transaction_id, amount, transaction_date FROM transactions WHERE amount > 1000
SELECT * FROM transactions WHERE transaction_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30' ORDER BY transaction_date DESC
SELECT * FROM transactions WHERE transaction_date >= '2021-01-01' ORDER BY amount DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT transaction_id, amount, transaction_date FROM transactions WHERE merchant_id = 1001;
SELECT transaction_id, reason FROM suspicious_transactions WHERE flagged_by = 'Fraud Detection Team' ORDER BY flagged_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM transactions t JOIN suspicious_transactions st ON t.transaction_id = st.transaction_id WHERE t.amount > 1000;
SELECT merchant_id, AVG(amount) AS avg_amount FROM transactions GROUP BY merchant_id HAVING avg_amount > 5000 ORDER BY avg_amount DESC;
SELECT * FROM suspicious_transactions;
SELECT transaction_id, amount, timestamp FROM suspicious_transactions WHERE amount > 1000;
SELECT source_account_id, destination_account_id FROM suspicious_transactions WHERE timestamp >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT account_holder_name, account_type, balance FROM account_details WHERE balance < 0;
SELECT transaction_id, flag_reason FROM transaction_flags ORDER BY transaction_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM suspicious_transactions WHERE amount > 1000 ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT account_holder_name, balance FROM account_details WHERE account_type = 'Savings';
SELECT transaction_id, flag_reason FROM transaction_flags WHERE flag_reason LIKE '%fraud%';
SELECT source_account_id, destination_account_id FROM suspicious_transactions WHERE amount > 500 ORDER BY amount DESC;
SELECT account_holder_name, balance FROM account_details WHERE balance < 0 ORDER BY balance ASC;
SELECT * FROM transactions;
SELECT transaction_id, transaction_date, amount FROM transactions WHERE amount > 1000;
SELECT * FROM accounts ORDER BY balance DESC;
SELECT customer_id, name, address FROM customers WHERE phone_number LIKE '%123%';
SELECT * FROM suspicious_activities JOIN transactions ON suspicious_activities.transaction_id = transactions.transaction_id;
SELECT * FROM transactions;
SELECT transaction_date, amount, sender_id, receiver_id FROM transactions ORDER BY transaction_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM accounts WHERE balance > 1000 ORDER BY balance DESC;
SELECT CONCAT(name, ' - ', address) AS customer_info FROM customers;
SELECT MAX(amount) AS max_transaction_amount FROM transactions;
SELECT * FROM transaction_data ORDER BY transaction_date DESC;
SELECT transaction_id, amount, source_account, destination_account FROM transaction_data WHERE amount > 1000;
SELECT customer_name, customer_address FROM customer_data WHERE customer_id = 123;
SELECT * FROM suspicious_transactions ORDER BY transaction_id ASC;
SELECT team_id, team_lead FROM investigation_team WHERE team_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM transaction_data
SELECT transaction_id, amount, transaction_date FROM transaction_data WHERE amount > 1000
SELECT transaction_id, amount, source_account, destination_account FROM transaction_data ORDER BY transaction_date DESC
SELECT customer_name, customer_address FROM customer_data WHERE LENGTH(customer_name) > 10
SELECT transaction_id, reason FROM suspicious_transactions JOIN alert_history ON suspicious_transactions.transaction_id = alert_history.transaction_id
